column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I have never been to the restaurant but I attend an event which orders Lou Malnati's every week.  Now
column2: I have had a couple decades of pizza
column3: more than enough to last a lifetime
column4: and I am Never happy to see pizza served at an event even if it is free. However
column5: I was introduced to The "Lou" which is a vegetarian deep dish pizza
column6: and I am sold.  I am not even a vegetarian and I actual Look Forward to having a slice every week
column7: even after many many weeks I have not grown tired of it.  The "Lou" has converted me back into being a pizza eater after many years of being a pizza avoider.  What more can I say.
